
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
hospitals <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/36-SURE/36-SURE.github.io/main/data/hospitals.csv")
```


```{r}
#View(hospitals)
hospitals |> 
  rename(heart.failure.cost = 'Procedure.Heart Failure.Cost',
         heart.failure.quality = 'Procedure.Heart Failure.Quality') |> 
   filter(heart.failure.quality != "Unknown") |> 
  ggplot(aes(y = heart.failure.cost, x = heart.failure.quality)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```



```{r}
hospitals |> 
  filter(Facility.Type != "Unknown", Rating.Readmission != "None" ) |> 
  ggplot(aes(y = Rating.Readmission, x = Facility.Type)) +
  geom_col()

```
